professional_profile.title: Professional Profile
professional_profile.content: Software engineer passionate about innovation and software development with proven experience in C#/.NET development and software testing. Currently a C#/.NET Developer at EMWORKS Tunisia.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer (C#/.NET)
details: Collaborated with the development team to maintain and improve the EMWorks Studio software, using C#, C++ and .NET Framework technologies.
Implemented new features and fixed bugs to optimize application performance.

experiences.title: Test and Validation Engineer (QA)
details: Created, executed and improved test plans to ensure complete coverage and compliance with quality standards.
Thoroughly analyzed requirements, identified test scenarios and wrote precise test cases.
Closely collaborated with development teams, performed ad-hoc testing and contributed to documentation.
